data.title: Who was Burt Reynolds married to when he died and who inherited his estate?
data.meta_description: WHO WAS BURT REYNOLDS MARRIED TO WHEN HE DIED ?. The actor had various relationships but not all ended in marriage. Find out more about the famous actor.
data.text:
Hollywood's labelling is quite essential for any actor's career. First, you have the muscular, handsome guy who cannot miss the action-movie role. Second, there's the sweet guy that performs love roles quite well. During his acting years, Burt Reynolds became the sex symbol and icon of American popular culture. His good looks didn't only win him fans but beautiful women in his life. The legendary actor had four outspoken relationships during his life. So, who was Burt Reynolds married to when he died, and did he leave any of them his wealth?

Everyone recalls Burt Reynold's impressive career as an actor. He had the best fun on and off the screen. Burt was married twice and dated several famous women in the movie industry. But who was the actor married to when he died?

Burt Reynolds profile summary

Name Burton Reynolds Jr.Date of birthFebruary 11, 1936Place of birthLansing, Michigan, United States of AmericaDiedSeptember 6, 2018 (Aged 62)Place of deathJupiter, Florida, the United States of AmericaResting placeHollywood Forever CemeteryAlma materFlorida State UniversityOccupationActorYears active1958 – 2018SpousesJudy Carne (married in 1963 and divorced in 1965), Loni Anderson (married in 1988 and divorced in 1994)PartnersDina Shore (1971 - 1975), Sally Field (1976 – 1980)ChildrenQuinton ReynoldsWebsiteburtreynolds.com

Who was Burt Reynolds married to when he died?

Burt Reynolds's great looks won him charming ladies over the years. However, he was not married to anyone at the time of his death in 2018. Burt's latest relationship before passing away in 2018 was with Kate Edelman Johnson, from 2003 to 2005. Also, the actor’s last marriage was to Loni Anderson, whom he divorced in 1994.

Edelman Johnson is a film producer and daughter of the famous producer Louis F. Edelman. She manages the rights to some of the television series produced by her late father in the 1950s and 1960s.

How many times was Burt Reynolds married?

Burt Reynolds was married twice to two lovely ladies, who were also popular. The legendary actor also had a relationship with other famous women over the years. So, who are these beautiful ladies?

Loni Anderson

Loni Anderson married Burt Reynolds for six years, from 1988 to 1994. He was the last wife of the famous actor before he died in 2018, even though he went ahead to have other relationships.

Three years before Burt Reynolds perished, he regretted marrying Loni. He told People during a 2015 interview the following:

Was a really dumb move on my part. I should have known that you don’t marry an actress. It wasn’t lollipops and roses.

Loni Anderson and Burt met in 1981 and started dating a year later. Their relationship was always on the news as they were regarded as one of the most adorable Hollywood power couples.

The two later adopted a son, Quinton Reynolds. However, they announced their separation in 1993, which shocked fans. Lack of sexual relations might have been one of the main reasons the couple separated.

Sally Field

Who is the love of Burt Reynolds' life? According to Burton's interview with Vanity Fair in 2015, Sally Field was the love of his life, and he regretted never trying to make amends with her. Burt and Sally dated for four years, from 1976 to 1980.

Unfortunately, after Burt Reynold's death, Sally stated that she was not the love of his life and that their relationship was complicated and hurtful. She opened up about her love life in her 2018 memoir, In Pieces, which she is glad Burt is not alive to read.

In an interview with Variety, Sally stated that Burt was not someone she wanted to be around.

He was just not good for me in any way. And he had somehow invented in his rethinking of everything that I was more important to him than he had thought, but I wasn't. He just wanted to have the thing he didn't have. I didn't want to deal with that.

Dina Shore

Burt was in a relationship with Dinah for four years, from 1971 to 1975. Burt broke up the relationship when he realized he wanted to have children.

Judy Carne

Judy Carne was Burton’s first wife; they were together from 1963 to 1965 (although some sources state 1966). After the separation, Judy was married two more times to Robert Bergman in the 1970s and John McCook.

How many children did Burt Reynolds have?

Who did Burt Reynolds have a child with? The fascinating thing about Burt Reynolds is that he did not sire any biological children, although he had numerous relationships. However, he adopted Quinton Reynolds during his brief marriage to Loni Anderson, making him his only legal offspring.

Did Sally Fields attend Burt Reynolds' funeral?

Burt Reynolds' death was a great shock to many people, including his fans. Loved ones memorialized him shortly after his passing, but Sally Field was not in attendance. Instead, some sources claimed that she entered through the church’s side door before the service started.

However, a spokesperson for the actress stated that Sally did not attend as she was busy promoting her memoir.

Quick facts about Burt Reynolds

Who was Burt Reynolds' last wife? Burt was only married twice to Judy Carne (1963-1965) and Loni Anderson (1988-1994). Loni was Burt's last wife. He also had a relationship with Dina Shore and Sally Field.

Who was Burt Reynolds' true love? Three years before his death, Burt Reynolds wrote in his memoir, But enough Abou Me, that he regretted not fighting hard enough to keep his relationship with Sally Field. They separated in 1980 and did not marry.

Did Sally Field marry Burt Reynolds? Sally and Burt did not marry during their four-year relationship. However, they were still one of the most iconic couples in Hollywood at the time.

How long did Sally Fields and Burt Reynolds stay together? Sally and Burt Reynolds stayed together for four years, from 1976 to 1980.

Who inherited Burt Reynolds' estate? Burt intentionally left Quinton Reynolds, his only son, out of his will and named his niece, Nancy Lee Brown Hess, as his estate's trustee.

What did Sally Field say when Burt Reynolds died? Sally Field stated that Burt was not someone that she could be around. She also mentioned that he was not good for her, and he had created the idea that she was more important to him than anything else, which was not the case.

Was Burt Reynolds married to Dinah? Dinah never married Burt Reynolds. Instead, he married Loni Anderson after a four-year relationship with Sally Field that did not result in marriage.

People have asked, "Who was Burt Reynolds married to when he died?" His last marriage was to Loni Anderson, whom she divorced in 1994. At his death, he was not in any known relationship.
